mapper.sql: menu_id, parent_id, name, url, perms, type, icon, order_num, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_menu
menu_id,
parent_id,
name,
url,
perms,
type,
icon,
order_num,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
#{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update sys_menu
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_menu set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT c.menu_id, c.parent_id, c. NAME, c.url, c.perms, c.type, c.icon, c.order_num, c.gmt_create, c.gmt_modified FROM sys_user_role a LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu b ON b.role_id = a.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu c ON c.menu_id = b.menu_id
a.user_id = #{userId}
